news.title: Wholesale inflation measure was unchanged in June
news.summary: The producer price index for June was expected to increase 0.2%, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate. The index was up 0.3% in May, and 0.4% in April.

news.title: Goldman Sachs tops estimates as traders generate $840 million more revenue than expected
news.summary: Trading desks across Wall Street have benefited as President Donald Trump's tariff policies have roiled markets for bonds, currencies, commodities and stocks.

news.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang wants to sell more advanced chips to China after H20 ban is lifted
news.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang visited Beijing after the U.S. allowed its H20 chip to be sold in China. Huang: "I think it's a good thing that we have the H20 in China"

news.title: Bank of America puts up mixed results as net interest income misses analysts' expectations
news.summary: Bank of America put out a mixed quarter, exceeding estimates on EPS and missing on revenue. Bank of America missed on revenue and one of its main drivers, net interest income.

news.title: As media reckons with strategic shifts, a new crop of leaders is coming into play
news.summary: Those with backgrounds in finance and dealmaking are increasingly reshaping the landscape of Hollywood. In an industry that's long been run by storied Hollywood executives, those with finance backgrounds are becoming more prominent.

news.title: Goldman Sachs’s stock gains as equities trading helps fuel a big earnings beat
news.summary: Goldman Sachs’s stock rallies as its market-trading businesses shine. Morgan Stanley saw investment-banking revenue slip. Goldman Sachs is the world's largest investment bank.

news.title: The market’s been wrong on the Fed for three straight years — this Deutsche Bank strategist says it’s now looking like four.
news.summary: Deutsche Bank strategist Henry Allen says markets are complacent over inflation. But tariffs are making that a dangerous viewpoint right now, he says.

news.title: ‘I enjoy vacations to Europe’: I’m 75 and have $1 million in an IRA. Why do I feel guilty?
news.summary: “When I become debilitated, I plan to end my life at Dignitas,” he says. “We have no long-term-care insurance.”

news.title: Rick Santelli describes how he got a quick lesson with his first trade
news.summary: The veteran CNBC reporter recalled the ups and downs of his first trade. He also recalled the highs and lows of being a trader for the first time.

news.title: Wholesale prices are flat in June, PPI shows, and point to muted effect of tariffs on inflation
news.summary: Wholesale prices were unchanged in June and showed only a mild effect from U.S. tariffs. It adds to the growing view that trade wars won’t lead to a big increase in inflation.
